law.catch_line: The purpose of the Program is to make technical assistance grants to expand:...
law.text:
The purpose of the Program is to make technical assistance grants to expand:
the production of decent and affordable housing for families of limited income through self-help in rehabilitation and construction;
homeownership opportunities for those who would not have these opportunities without the cost savings achieved by self-help; and
self-reliance, pride of ownership, and sense of community for participants.
